tool_description:
This Sneaker Database API will allow you to get every sneaker-related information you need including images, product links as well as prices from StockX. 

The data is from StockX, the sneaker shopping platform.
name: Sneaker DB StockX - Light Version
title: Sneaker DB StockX - Light Version

api_list.name: Search v3
api_list.description:
This endpoint will retrieve data from any search query.

Parameter:
s (* required)

api_list.name: Search V2
api_list.description:
This endpoint will retrieve data from any search query.

Parameters:
query (* required)
perpage (Default: 40)
page (Default: 1)

api_list.name: Search V1
api_list.description:
This endpoint will retrieve data from any search query.

s (* required)
perpage ( Default: 20)

api_list.name: Get Related Products
api_list.description: This endpoint returns related products of each product.

api_list.name: Product Full Detail
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns product full details, such as description, price, last sale. and much more.

Parameter:
urlKey (* required)
